casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. Brandon S. LAVERGNE
v.
STATE of Louisiana NO. 2016-KH-2043 Supreme Court of Louisiana. February 9, 2018 Denied. Relator has previously exhausted his right to state collateral review. See, e.g., State ex rel. Lavergne v. State, 16-0469 (La. 4/22/16), 192 So.3d 725 . GENOVESE, J., recused.
